attractions.name: Silver Star
attractions.short_description: One of Europe's tallest and fastest roller coasters
attractions.description: As one of Europe's tallest and fastest roller coasters, Silver Star offers an exhilarating experience with its towering heights and swift descents. Built in collaboration with Mercedes-Benz, this steel hypercoaster features a first drop of 73 meters and multiple airtime hills that provide a sensation of weightlessness throughout the ride.

attractions.name: Blue Fire Megacoaster
attractions.short_description: High-speed launch coaster with multiple inversions
attractions.description: This launch coaster propels riders from 0 to 100 km/h in just 2.5 seconds, featuring multiple inversions and high-speed twists. Blue Fire combines cutting-edge technology with thrilling elements like a 38-meter high loop, horseshoe and corkscrew elements, and a heartline roll. The ride is themed around energy and features special effects including fire, water, and lighting.

attractions.name: Wodan – Timburcoaster
attractions.short_description: Massive wooden roller coaster with Norse mythology theme
attractions.description: A wooden coaster that combines traditional design with modern engineering, providing a smooth yet thrilling ride through intricate wooden structures. Named after the Nordic god Odin, Wodan features a steep first drop and multiple high-speed turns through a complex wooden structure. The queue line takes visitors through a Norse village with various theming elements that tell the story of Wodan.

attractions.name: Voletarium
attractions.short_description: Europe's largest flying theater experience
attractions.description: Europe's largest flying theater that simulates a flight over various European landmarks, offering a breathtaking aerial journey. Inspired by the adventures of the fictional Eulenstein brothers, this attraction uses state-of-the-art technology to create the illusion of flying over Europe's most iconic locations, including the Matterhorn, Neuschwanstein Castle, and Mediterranean coastlines.

attractions.name: Alpine Express Enzian
attractions.short_description: Family-friendly powered coaster through Alpine scenery
attractions.description: A gentle powered coaster that takes riders through an Alpine landscape. This family-friendly attraction offers a scenic journey through miniature Alpine villages, forests, and mountain landscapes. The ride provides beautiful views of the surrounding park and is a perfect introduction to roller coasters for younger guests.

attractions.name: Arena of Football - Be Part of It
attractions.short_description: Interactive football-themed attraction
attractions.description: An interactive attraction where visitors can test their football skills in various challenges. The attraction features multiple zones where guests can practice shooting, passing, and other football techniques. Giant screens display statistics and achievements, allowing visitors to compete against each other or work together as a team.

attractions.name: Arthur
attractions.short_description: Indoor/outdoor family coaster based on the 'Arthur and the Minimoys' films
attractions.description: Based on the 'Arthur and the Minimoys' film series, this indoor/outdoor family coaster takes riders on an adventure through the miniature world of the Minimoys. The track weaves through elaborate themed environments both inside and outside, featuring animated figures and special effects that bring the movie's world to life. The ride combines storytelling with a gentle yet exciting coaster experience.

attractions.name: Atlantica SuperSplash
attractions.short_description: Water coaster with two steep drops and splash landing
attractions.description: A water coaster featuring two steep drops ending in a splash zone that creates a wave effect for spectators. Themed around a Portuguese sailing expedition, the ride takes visitors through various scenery before the dramatic final plunge. The attraction combines elements of a roller coaster with a traditional log flume, offering both thrills and refreshing splashes during hot summer days.

attractions.name: Atlantis Adventure
attractions.short_description: Dark ride through the mythical underwater city of Atlantis
attractions.description: A dark ride that takes visitors through the legendary sunken city of Atlantis. Guests board submarine-themed vehicles that travel through elaborate underwater scenes featuring ancient architecture, marine life, and special lighting effects. The ride tells the story of Atlantis through various themed rooms and includes interactive elements where riders can discover hidden treasures.

attractions.name: Baaa Express
attractions.short_description: Gentle children's monorail ride with sheep theme
attractions.description: A gentle monorail ride designed for young children, themed around sheep and farm life. The cars, designed to look like fluffy sheep, travel along an elevated track that provides views of the surrounding area. This slow-paced attraction is perfect for families with small children who aren't yet ready for more intense rides.

keyFacts.min_height: None specific (children under 100 cm must be accompanied)

attractions.name: Bellevue Ferris Wheel
attractions.short_description: Classic Ferris wheel offering panoramic views of the park
attractions.description: A traditional Ferris wheel offering spectacular views of Europa-Park and the surrounding Black Forest region. Standing at 55 meters tall, this attraction provides a peaceful ride with excellent photo opportunities. Each gondola is enclosed and comfortable, making this a perfect attraction for all ages to enjoy the scenery from a different perspective.

attractions.name: Castello dei Medici
attractions.short_description: Indoor dark boat ride through Renaissance Italy
attractions.description: A dark boat ride that takes visitors through scenes of Renaissance Italy during the time of the Medici family. The indoor attraction features detailed scenes depicting Italian art, culture, and historical events, with animated figures and atmospheric lighting creating an immersive experience. The gentle boat ride is suitable for all ages and provides both entertainment and educational value.

attractions.name: Dancing Dingie
attractions.short_description: Spinning boat ride with wave motion
attractions.description: A family ride featuring rotating boats that move in a wave-like pattern. Each boat spins independently while the entire ride platform undulates, creating a dynamic and playful experience. The nautical theme includes colorful boat designs and water-themed decorations, making it a perfect fit for the maritime section of the park.

attractions.name: Euro-Mir
attractions.short_description: Spinning coaster themed to Russian space station
attractions.description: A unique spinning roller coaster inspired by the Russian Mir space station. The ride begins with a slow spiral ascent inside four mirrored towers, followed by a high-speed journey with multiple turns and drops while the cars spin freely. The space theme is enhanced by electronic music, mirror effects, and futuristic design elements throughout the queue line and ride experience.

attractions.name: Eurosat CanCan Coaster
attractions.short_description: Indoor coaster in a geodesic dome with Paris theme
attractions.description: An indoor roller coaster housed within a geodesic dome resembling the Spaceship Earth attraction. Originally space-themed, the ride was renovated in 2018 to feature a Moulin Rouge/CanCan theme based on Parisian nightlife. The indoor setting allows for elaborate lighting effects, music, and themed scenes as riders experience the twisting, turning track in near darkness.

attractions.name: Euro-Tower
attractions.short_description: Observation tower with rotating platform
attractions.description: A 75-meter tall observation tower with a slowly rotating platform that provides 360° panoramic views of the entire park and surrounding Black Forest region. The enclosed cabin rises gradually while rotating, allowing visitors to see the landscape from all angles. Informational displays help identify various landmarks visible from the tower.

attractions.name: Fjord-Rafting
attractions.short_description: Whitewater rafting ride through Scandinavian landscape
attractions.description: A whitewater rapids ride taking visitors through a Scandinavian-themed landscape. Circular rafts navigate through churning waters, rock formations, waterfalls, and geysers. The unpredictable movement of the rafts and various water effects ensure that riders never know when they might get splashed, making it a refreshing attraction during warm weather.

attractions.name: Jim Button - Journey Through Morrowland
attractions.short_description: Family dark ride based on the children's book character
attractions.description: A dark ride based on the popular German children's book character Jim Button (Jim Knopf). Visitors board Emma the locomotive and journey through the magical world of Morrowland, encountering various characters and scenes from the stories. The ride combines physical sets with projection technology to create an immersive storytelling experience suitable for children and families.

attractions.name: Josefina's Magical Imperial Journey
attractions.short_description: Indoor boat ride through Austrian imperial palace
attractions.description: An indoor boat ride that takes visitors through a recreation of an Austrian imperial palace, following the adventures of Josefina, a fictional royal chambermaid. The elaborately themed scenes depict life in Habsburg-era Austria with animated figures, detailed room recreations, and special effects. The gentle pace and entertaining storyline make this a perfect attraction for all ages.

attractions.name: Kolumbusjolle
attractions.short_description: Rocking boat ride inspired by Columbus' ships
attractions.description: A swinging ship attraction themed after Christopher Columbus' journey to the New World. The large boat-shaped vessel swings back and forth in a pendulum motion, reaching impressive heights at the peak of each swing. The ride offers different intensity levels throughout the day, with milder swings during certain operating hours to accommodate a wider range of guests.

attractions.name: Madame Freudenreich Curiosités
attractions.short_description: Charming dark ride featuring an elderly lady who raises dinosaurs
attractions.description: A whimsical dark ride where visitors tour the home of Madame Freudenreich, an elderly Alsatian woman who keeps dinosaurs in her backyard and feeds them with cheese. The humorous attraction features detailed animatronic scenes showing the dinosaurs in various situations around her traditional Alsatian house. The charming storyline and unique concept make this a memorable family experience.

attractions.name: Matterhorn-Blitz
attractions.short_description: Wild mouse coaster with alpine theme
attractions.description: A wild mouse style roller coaster with an Alpine theme and unique elevator lift. The ride simulates an out-of-control journey down the Matterhorn mountain in a traditional Swiss sledge. The coaster features tight turns, sudden drops, and a distinctive zigzag layout, creating the feeling of nearly going off the edge at each turn. The elaborately themed station resembles a Swiss chalet.

attractions.name: Old Mac Donald's Tractor Fun
attractions.short_description: Children's tractor ride through farm scenery
attractions.description: A children's ride where young guests can drive miniature tractors through a charming farm setting. The tractors follow a fixed track but have a steering wheel that allows children to feel like they're controlling the vehicle. Along the route, riders encounter farm animals, crops, and rural scenes, complete with sound effects and animated figures that bring the farm to life.

keyFacts.min_height: None specific (children under 100 cm must be accompanied)

attractions.name: Pegasus
attractions.short_description: Family coaster with Greek mythology theme
attractions.description: A family-friendly roller coaster themed around the mythological flying horse Pegasus. This wooden-style coaster (actually made of steel) offers a balanced experience with enough excitement for older children while remaining approachable for younger riders. The Greek-inspired station building and queue line feature mythological decorations and storytelling elements that introduce visitors to the legend of Pegasus.

attractions.name: Pirates in Batavia
attractions.short_description: Elaborate dark boat ride through 17th century Indonesia
attractions.description: A detailed dark boat ride that takes visitors through the exotic world of 17th century Batavia (now Jakarta, Indonesia). Recently rebuilt after a fire, this attraction features advanced animatronics, detailed scenes depicting pirate adventures, and an engaging storyline following the characters Bartholomeus van Robbemond and Jopie as they search for the mystical Fire Tiger. The immersive experience includes multiple special effects, scents, and an original musical score.

attractions.name: Poppy Towers
attractions.short_description: Child-sized free-fall tower attraction
attractions.description: A gentle drop tower designed specifically for children, themed around colorful flower towers. Multiple small towers provide a milder version of the free-fall experience found on larger drop rides. The child-friendly design, cheerful theming, and reduced height and intensity make this a perfect introduction to thrill rides for younger guests.

attractions.name: Poseidon
attractions.short_description: Water coaster combining roller coaster and flume elements
attractions.description: A water coaster that combines traditional roller coaster elements with water flume sections. Themed around Greek mythology and the god of the sea, Poseidon features elaborate Greek architecture with a large temple facade at the entrance. The ride alternates between high-speed coaster sections and water-based segments, culminating in a splash that's especially welcome on hot days.

attractions.name: Snorri Touren
attractions.short_description: Indoor dark ride featuring the Icelandic character Snorri
attractions.description: An enchanting dark ride that follows Snorri, the cute mascot of Rulantica (Europa-Park's water park), on a journey through Icelandic mythology. The attraction combines physical sets with projection technology and special effects to create an immersive underwater fantasy world. The slow-moving vehicles allow visitors of all ages to enjoy the colorful scenes and follow Snorri's adventure.

attractions.name: Swiss Bob Run
attractions.short_description: Bobsled-themed roller coaster through Alpine landscape
attractions.description: A bobsled-style roller coaster where vehicles travel freely through a trough-like track simulating the feeling of an Olympic bobsled run. Set in the Swiss themed area, this ride offers a unique experience as the cars slide around banked turns without being locked to a traditional rail. The alpine theming includes mountain scenery, Swiss chalets, and authentic details that enhance the immersive experience.

attractions.name: Tirol Log Flume
attractions.short_description: Traditional log flume ride through Tyrolean scenery
attractions.description: A classic log flume water ride set in a picturesque Tyrolean landscape. Riders board hollowed-out log vehicles that navigate through a water channel, featuring two drops of increasing height. The ride offers beautiful views of the Austria-themed area before the exciting splashdown finale. The traditional alpine setting includes themed elements like sawmills, forests, and mountain villages.

attractions.name: Tnnevirvel
attractions.short_description: Spinning raft ride with whirlpool effect
attractions.description: A spinning raft ride where circular platforms rotate while moving through a water channel. The name, meaning 'barrel whirl' in Norwegian, reflects the sensation of spinning around like being caught in a whirlpool. The Nordic-themed attraction features wooden barrels as the ride vehicles and decorative elements inspired by Norwegian folklore.

attractions.name: Vienna Wave Swing - Glckspilz
attractions.short_description: Elaborately themed wave swinger ride
attractions.description: An ornate wave swinger ride decorated in the style of classical Vienna. Riders sit in chairs suspended from chains that swing outward as the ride rotates and rises, creating a graceful flying sensation. The beautiful Art Nouveau design includes intricate details, gold accents, and painted scenes that celebrate Austrian culture and history, making it as much a visual treat as it is a fun ride.

attractions.name: Vindjammer
attractions.short_description: Swinging ship ride with Viking theme
attractions.description: A large swinging ship attraction themed as a Viking longboat. The pendulum motion creates varying sensations of weightlessness and increased gravity as the ship swings higher and higher. The Viking theming is carried throughout the queue and surrounding area, with Norse imagery and decorative elements that place the ride within the context of Scandinavian exploration.

attractions.name: Volo da Vinci
attractions.short_description: Suspended pedal-powered ride based on da Vinci's flying machines
attractions.description: A unique suspended ride where guests pedal Leonardo da Vinci-inspired flying machines around a scenic course. The human-powered vehicles allow riders to control their speed as they navigate the elevated track, which offers beautiful views of the Italian-themed area. The attraction celebrates da Vinci's innovative spirit and fascination with flight through both the ride vehicles and the themed environment.

attractions.name: Voltron Nevera - Powered by Rimac
attractions.short_description: High-tech launched coaster inspired by electric supercars
attractions.description: One of Europa-Park's newest coasters, themed around the Croatian electric hypercar manufacturer Rimac. This launched coaster features multiple acceleration points, simulating the instant torque of electric motors. The futuristic theme extends throughout the queue and ride experience, with elements highlighting sustainable technology, innovative engineering, and high-performance electric vehicles.

attractions.name: Whale Adventures - Northern Lights
attractions.short_description: Suspended dark ride through Arctic seascapes
attractions.description: A suspended dark ride that takes visitors on an underwater journey through Arctic waters. Riders board whale-shaped vehicles that glide through scenes depicting the marine life and landscapes of the far north. Special effects including lighting, sound, and projection create the illusion of diving beneath the ocean surface, while the Northern Lights illuminate parts of the experience for a magical atmosphere.
